name: Basic Global Forecast
query: Forecast global copper demand through 2040 using the baseline scenario. Show me the breakdown by major segments and confidence levels.
expected_behavior: Successfully loads the copper-demand skill and runs the forecast script
Generates forecast data from 2020-2040 with annual granularity
Provides breakdown by all six major segments: Automotive, Grid Generation, Construction, Grid T&D, Industrial, Electronics, Other Uses
Shows confidence levels for each segment (HIGH_BOTTOM_UP for automotive, MEDIUM_BOTTOM_UP for grid generation, LOW_ALLOCATED/LOW_RESIDUAL for others)
Reports total demand for 2040 around 30 million tonnes for baseline scenario
Includes OEM vs replacement demand breakdown
Shows EV demand as percentage of total (should be 15-20% by 2040)
